snippet: Delegates of the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees, the largest component of the A.F.L.-C.I.O., will vote on June 21 for a new president.
abstract: American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees will hold elections to replace its longtime president Gerald W McEntee; candidates Lee Saunders and Danny Donohue are competing to helm an massive organization that faces falling membership and has been humbled by its failure to oust Wisconsin's anti-union governor, Scott Walker.
lead_paragraph: Delegates of the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees, the largest component of the A.F.L.-C.I.O., will vote on June 21 for a new president.

headline.seo: Fight Heats Up to Lead One of Nation’s Largest Unions
headline.main: For Labor, a Fight to Lead Heats Up
headline.print_headline: For Labor, a Fight to Lead Heats Up
